2318438E46CE0639D2B4409AC6707763: Crackling canines evolved from the Wyldness, their powerful claws are prized for use in crafting. Drawn to the power of LIGHTNING, these creatures can be found during rainy or stormy weather.
4C2B05574A0D90550BB0A683E9EC191A: Seek the land where Ninja spin to find the ELEMENTS locked within.
